Rlly good game

If there was a best way to describe Bioshock Infinite, it's that it's a certified classic. It is one of the greatest games out there. Memorable story, birthed one of, if not the most memorable female video game character of all time. And for good reason, she isn't a useless character, she is written well, the voice acting is superb, and the storyline actual leaves you remembering her.

Speaking of story, it is incredible. Coming from a writer's background, the story in this game is a little too good for a game. It is so shocking that they managed to write such a great story while also making it an engaging video game. Some games are games with story as a secondary, but this game has the story running right alongside the gameplay in quality.

I could go on and on about this amazing game, but I don't want to inadvertently spoil it. Just buy it if you care about games at all, if it's not already on your shelf.

(and if it's not, what the fuck?)

Не гра, а естетичний оргазм. Єдине, чого не вистачає, так це зброї, яка візуальна обростає всілякими приблудами після чергового апґрейду. Та це дрібниці насправді. Гра дуже крута. Від візуалу до персонажів і сюжету.
Тому наполегливо раджу усім купувати всю серію Bioshock загалом. А якщо на всю серію грошей не вистачає, то цілком спокійно можна починати знайомство з фрашизою саме з Bioshock: Infinite)

I bought the Bioshock collection on a sale, but I would've gladly paid $60 for this game alone. The others are great but HOLY SHIT. I didn't play this when It first came out, I realize i'm late to the party, but please, please please play this. 10/10

Good series. Definitely worth the try for those that likes fps games with an rpg element twist to it. The gameplay and storyline is in a way unique such that they try to blend in classic old vibes with a mix of what if sci-fi kinda realism (also kinda steampunk ish?) due to the technology and science in the game that seems quite fictious and advanced, yet also real and old. Good balance mechanics between the usage of weapons and abilities for a singleplayer story game series. The dlc minigames that they offer are also fun and the dlc expansion are really interesting and immersive. Overall game is worth it for those that have extra cash and want a good game with fps and rpg elements mixed in with a good story and gameplay. Definitely a must buy during special promotions. 
Can't wait for bioshock 4? :D
2k 啥时候出续作，nmd

BioShock Infinite is a pretty wild departure from the previous two games. You will see online that many people were dissatisfied with what they got because of several years of buildup in anticipation. I actually played this game before I even knew what Bioshock was. Going into it totally blind, this was an amazing experience. Elizabeth feels like a real person and is a great example of AI behaving cleverly in a video game. She doesn't become a hassle to protect because she hides and can defend herself. She doesn't become a hassle to escort because she constantly is tossing you money or items that she finds. Without spoiling it, her relationship with Booker is fantastic and the twist at the end regarding that made me unbelievably happy. The ending of the major narrative is nonsensical and is met with great disdain by most players. That's fair, because it is quite a bunch of nonsense. This is rectified in the  DLC, Burial at Sea.  You absolutely cannot play this game without playing Burial at Sea right afterwards.  Bioshock 1, BioShock Infinite, and Bioshock Burial at Sea is a Trilogy of games that have one continuous story. BioShock 2 is totally removed from this and is not canon, but is worth a playthrough anyway. The reason I give this game such a high rating is because in a time when every game coming out was dark and brooding and covered in brown pallets, this game is soaked with light and color. 

Everything you see has been vividly drawn and rendered and the devs are not afraid to utilize the most powerful colors they can find. I have to tip my hat to the artists that worked on this game, because  Colombia was a technical and visual achievement. Aside from that, the actual gameplay is fun and the game itself isn't very long. That might be a bonus or a detraction, depending on who you are, but I think it probably is just the right length. I absolutely recommend you give it a go, and playing it on easy mode is actually my a recommended way for a person who has never played an FPS to get into the genre.

[h1]«Разум субъекта предпринимает отчаянную попытку создать воспоминания там, где их нет…» [/h1]
Отличная трилогия с выдающийся историей. В целом история произвела на меня сильное впечатление, давно не испытывал подобных ощущений со времен прохождения ведьмака, когда тебя настолько заинтересовал сюжет, что зачитываешь вики до дыр. Третья часть серии порадовала отличной стрельбой по сравнению с тем, что было в первой и второй частях(конечно во второй части чутка улучшили, но все же). Графика выглядит очень красиво даже спустя 8 лет, как же приятно было прогуливаться по улицам Колумбии и вновь попасть в Восторг.  Очень порадовало дополнение Burial at Sea, ведь оно объясняло недосказанности первой части серии и поставило точку в сей прекрасной истории.[h1][i] "Долг был уплачен" [/i][/h1]

伊丽莎白永远的神！！生化奇兵第九艺术当之无愧！

Conseguí este juego a través del paquete de BioShock 1, 2 y las versiones remasterizadas. Tenía muchísimas expectativas, ya que el 1 y el 2 han sido juegazos... Lamentablemente, así como muchos otros jugadores, mi copia crasheaba apenas se mostraba el logo de 2K en la intro.

Probé todas y cada una de las soluciones que proponía la Comunidad... Ninguna funcionó. Pero eso no es todo: contacté al Soporte de 2K, y básicamente me hicieron escanear Windows con la consola y con PowerShell [cuando escaneé por primera vez, sí detectó errores. A Windows le faltaban dos IMÁGENES EN .PNG... Es literalmente el ÚNICO problema que tenía mi Windows]. Cuando ya no sabían qué hacer, ¡querían que contactase con el Soporte de MICROSOFT! ¡Con el Soporte de una empresa que [b] NADA [/b]tuvo que ver con una sola línea de código de este juego!

Si ustedes sí pudieron correrlo o si pudieron solucionar los CTD's, realmente me alegro por ustedes. Yo me llevé una decepción gigantesca, la cual fue sobrehumanamente agravada por un Soporte Técnico cuya inoperancia no hace sino equipararse al de Bugisoft...
Simplesmente orgasmico, a historia é de cair o cu da bunda de tão boa, maravilhoso

Stiff gunplay and lacklustre writing with a story of "oh look the oppressed are just as bad as the oppressor". Some contrived time travel stuff at the end about how American religious fundamentalism is bad (literally the most uncontroversial statement). Avoid like the plague.

伊丽莎白，YYDS,
画面与前两作相比简直是天翻地覆的变化，天空城美，伊丽莎白更美，情感塑造上也比前两作有更多的表现力，并且出现很多和前作连接的内容，对系列有情感的玩家真的不容错过，即使是没玩儿过前两作的也可以从这一部体验，不管是画面还是难度都亲民多了。

Сложность игры – как пружина; чем жестче пружина, тем сложнее играть. И не измеряется сложность ботов этих, не в   большой живучести, а в адекватной меткости и урона в играющего

I might be late to the party, but I had a great blast playing through this game! Story is awesome, the sceenery is awesome and it is awesome whenever I find one of the many hidden secrets in the game! :D
I got 14 hours of action packed gun play, with crazy magics to spice things up even more. I also felt like a little detective from time to time, following clues to find secrets.

Pros:
+ Great story
+ Great world building
+ fantastic music!
+ Cool magics to spice up the gun play
+ Great riddles and secrets to uncover

Cons:
- Lacking boss fights (nothing special)
- Enemy variety very low
- 14 hours and not really feel the replay value
What can i say? It's Bioshock.
